title: Sinister: Tales of Dread 2013
description: Fourteen brand new 2013 tales of dread ranging from horror to dark science fiction and noir, SINISTER will keep you awake at night. 244 pages of aliens who come from the sky, a detective working his last case, a skull flenser who loves his job, and various evils and dark chills creep through this new collection from the Edgar and Stoker nominated author, Billie Sue Mosiman. The included stories are:SinisterTransformed: The Kindness of StrangersSaving the SystemSkins of Our FathersCursedDying in L.A.The ImpossibleHell & BrimstoneOut of the SkyShadowed ThingsWhite SkullsUnreliableVerbotenTru-Blood"Billie Sue Mosiman will keep you on the edge of your seat all the way!" Ed Gorman, bestselling author
author: Billie Sue Mosiman
